This is a test file with special characters and unicode in the filename.
Content includes test patterns for search functionality:

Email addresses: john@acme.com, sarah.smith@bigco.com, procurement@supplier.com
Financial terms: Q1 revenue, quarterly results, $1.2M
Legal terms: force majeure, confidential information, indemnification  
Dates: March 31, 2024, Q1 2024, 2024-03-31
Remote work: WFH, remote work policy

This file tests unicode filename handling in the knowledge base system.
